title: Expose recommendation conflict metadata via API for segment positioning views

sections.text: Add API support to fetch persisted recommendation conflict metadata (from GOLD-32) alongside positioning recommendations for one or more segments. Define a stable response schema that includes conflicting segments, recommendation category/field, and the conflicting statements, with pagination/filters as needed for the UI. Ensure conflicts are only returned for the requesting workspace and are covered by integration tests.
